text: Lord Ivar Mountbatten, son of the 3rd Marquess of Milford Haven and cousin to the Queen, is in a reflective mood. He picks up a photograph taken 24 years ago on the day of his wedding to his former wife Penny, the mother of their three daughters.'That was the best day of my life,'he says.'I loved it.'Two years ago, Lord Ivar created quite a stir when he confessed to having struggled with his sexuality throughout most of that 16 - year marriage. Finally, he admitted he was gay after finding contentment with his new love James Coyle, whom he met in the swish Swiss ski resort of Verbier.
